data.title: John Carney - Vice President, Head Of Architecture at Aptos
data.meta_description: John Carney has a diverse and extensive work experience spanning over several roles and industries.
data.text:
John Carney has a diverse and extensive work experience spanning over several roles and industries. Their most recent position was as the Vice President and Head of Architecture at Aptos Retail starting in January 2022. Prior to that, they served as a Director at Informatica from October to December 2021. From December 2019 to October 2021, John held the role of Chief Technology Officer at MeBeBot.

Before joining MeBeBot, John worked for Infor from 2007 to 2019, holding the positions of Senior Development Manager, Networked Order Management (June to November 2019) and Senior Manager, Architecture (April 2007 to November 2019). John also served as a Solutions Architect at Starmount from April 2007 to September 2016.

John's earlier experience includes working as a Staff Member at QuakeCon Organization (1999 to 2010), a Senior Principal Technical Consultant at Oracle Corporation (2004 to 2007), a Lead Technical Support Developer at 360Commerce (2004 to 2006), a Senior Software Engineer at TowerJ Corporation (2000 to 2001), and a Programmer at American Sigma (1995 to 1996).

John Carney attended Jamestown Community College from 1991 to 1993, where they pursued a degree in Computer Science. John successfully graduated with an Associate of Science (A.S.) degree.
